# TCG Arena - iOS App Copilot Instructions

This is an iOS SwiftUI application for Trading Card Games collection management with Firebase backend.

## Project Overview
- **Name**: TCG Arena
- **Platform**: iOS (SwiftUI)
- **Backend**: Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Storage)
- **Design**: Apple-style minimal design
- **Target**: Trading Card Games enthusiasts (Pokemon, One Piece, Magic, YuGiOh)

## Key Features
1. Digital collection management with card scanning
2. Tournament map with store locations
3. Community features (chat, forums)
4. Deck building tools
5. Real-time price monitoring
6. Freemium model

## Architecture
- MVVM pattern with SwiftUI
- Firebase for backend services
- MapKit for location features
- Vision framework for card scanning

## Development Guidelines
- Follow iOS design guidelines
- Use SwiftUI best practices
- Implement proper error handling
- Use async/await for Firebase operations
- Maintain clean code architecture
